title: SD06 Collection
description: Collection of almost all previous products, with a range of music, and sound effects.
longDescription:
Collection of all previous products, with a range of music, and sound effects.

(Excludes 6 x Extended mixes for file size optimisation)

SD00 Atmospheric - https://publish.unrealengine.com/v3/edit-product/471d0af67e7f44afa2bd0b89b382ad78

3 suites of atmospheric background music, collected as 10 tracks, 8 tracks, 10 tracks plus 1 extra.

First suite also combined into a single track (001 - The Suite)

SD01 Various - https://publish.unrealengine.com/v3/edit-product/cbf6866344004bc6bd3f54f8d2b50572

A selection of clips, loops, tracks for background music, in a range of styles, from light 'blippy' to sombre and dark ambient.

SD02 Themes - https://publish.unrealengine.com/v3/edit-product/587852ee208241d4afe610f067e96e42

Range of varied tracks for use as background music

SD03 Instrumentals - https://publish.unrealengine.com/v3/edit-product/ae7b54a3dfae44e58a402b6928d7954b

Selection of varied Electronic Instrumentals

SD05 SFX - https://publish.unrealengine.com/v3/edit-product/2b358b0c1ebb499dac63a2e1bbd9bfc4

A selection of sound effects from shots, non-player voices, and background noises for game ambience etc.

Example samplers at:

https://soundcloud.com/soundesign-3/sd00atmospheres

https://soundcloud.com/soundesign-3/sd01various

https://soundcloud.com/soundesign-3/sd02themes

https://soundcloud.com/soundesign-3/sd03instrumentals

https://soundcloud.com/soundesign-3/sd05sfx
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 500+

Number of Audio Cues: Matching

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) Various

Does music loop: (Yes/No) Various
